item.title: 취미(CHIMMI) - Honey
item.description:
작곡: CHIMMI2, CHIMMI1 / 작사: CHIMMI2, CHIMMI1
KY: 29402

너의 미소는 날 한없이
녹아내리게 해
서로의 숨결이
닿을 거리에
떨리듯 마주할
너의 웃음소리가
시간이 지날수록
더 사랑스러워
눈을
뗄 수 없게
가만히
널 바라보고 있어도
괜히 웃음만 나
괜히 웃음만 나
Woo honey baby
woo make me crazy
Woo
내게 젖어 들게 해
Woo honey baby
woo make me crazy
Woo
내게 젖어 들게 해

Your eyes blew
my mind
Your smile keeps me up
at night
Your voice won’t leave
my hand
It keeps on
on growing
I can’t imagine
a different face
I just want you
in my arms
What if we feel
the same

더 사랑스러워

uhm make me crazy

item.title: 취미(CHIMMI) - CINEMA
item.description:
작곡: CHIMMI2, CHIMMI1 / 작사: CHIMMI2, CHIMMI1
KY: 21478 / KY: 89601

When we were young
when you came with me
Want to take you
to the movies
How simple things
were
I felt like dreaming
you told me back then
Take me out
tonight
Next to my seat
you sat next to me
I’m just
looking at
Looking at
looking at you
When the light
shines
The light
shines on you
I’m just
looking at
Looking at
looking at you
Let me take you
to the cinema cinema
I want to hold
your hands
At the cinema
cinema
I want to take you
just only us two
I want to kiss you
at the cinema
여전히 너의 두 눈은
날 보고 있어
조금도
변함없는 듯
찬 바람이
들어올 틈도 없이
나는 널 넌 나를 안고
이제서야 말하지만
I’m just
looking at
Looking at
looking at you
몰랐겠지만
내 머릿속엔
I’m just
looking at
Looking at
looking at you
Won’t you take me
to the cinema cinema
I’d like to hold
your hands
At the cinema
cinema
I just want you
just only us two
I want to kiss you
at the cinema

Memories shines
through the stars
Seasons
don’t matter at all
Years go by winter
feels different now
But we don’t seem
different at all
I want to take you
to the cinema cinema
I want to hold
your hands
At the cinema
cinema
I want to take you
just only us two
I want to kiss you
at the cinema
